author: milos88
content:
Created PR for adding more test-vectors for HeaderWithProof: https://github.com/ethereum/portal-spec-tests/pull/49
These test vectors are for fork boundaries (last pre-fork, first post-fork)
Would be good if at least one other client can verify them

author: acolytec3
content: Will try and take a look today.

author: milos88
content:
I just updated PR to rename files from [../headers_with_proof/block_proofs_bellatrix/](https://github.com/ethereum/portal-spec-tests/tree/master/tests/mainnet/history/headers_with_proof/block_proofs_bellatrix) to remove block_hash from their name, in order to be consistent with names in other files.
Besides, block_hash is already a field in a file, so I don't think it's needed at all.
Let me know if there are objections and I will revert it.

author: acolytec3
content: Ultralight was able to deserialize all of the serialized proofs

author: acolytec3
content: and helped me uncover that our capella and deneb block numbers were off by 1 üòÖ

author: milos88
content: we had similar problem, that's what made me create the PR and make sure nobody else makes the same mistake üòÅ
